text: Jesus mo ana dama agoago e hula i hongo di ala gi Jerusalem, gei Jesus e hana i mua. Digaula e hula uli nadau gai, gei nia daangada ala e lloo adu i nadau muli le e mmaadagu. Gei Jesus ga haga dagabuli ana dama agoago gi mada ginaadou, ga hagi anga gi digaula nia mee ala gaa hai ang gi de Ia.
